item.description:

item.title: Toast’s Playbook for Scaling Engineering Onboarding
item.dc:creator: Arielle Shipper
item.description:
Toast’s Engineering Team Doubled. Here’s How They Scaled Onboarding. Onboarding goes beyond a one-size-fits-all buddy program and benefits reminders: it also helps prepare new hires for their specific teams and roles. Here’s a look at Toast’s onboarding playbook, designed to get new hires contributing quickly and to scale through rapid growth.

The post Toast’s Playbook for Scaling 口语 appeared first on Donut.
item.content:encoded:
Toast’s Engineering Team Doubled. Here’s How They Scaled Onboarding.

Onboarding goes beyond a one-size-fits-all buddy program and benefits reminders: it also helps prepare new hires for their specific teams and roles. Here’s a look at Toast’s onboarding playbook, designed to get new hires contributing quickly and to scale through rapid growth.

The post Toast’s Playbook for Scaling 口语 appeared first on Donut.

item.title: Onboarding is Broken. Here’s a Fix.
item.dc:creator: Arielle Shipper
item.description:
Onboarding is Broken. Here’s a Fix. On December 6th, 2018, Donut CEO Dan Manian and Human Side of Tech founder Vanessa Shaw teamed up for a fireside chat on using design thinking to create an onboarding playbook. Read the highlights here.

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Here’s How We Used Donut to Plan a Team Social
item.dc:creator: Courtney Stratton
item.description:
